text: Marthe Villalonga (born 20 March 1932) is a French actress. She was born in Fort-de-l'Eau, Algeria. She is known for her role as Antoinette in the 1985 comedy Three Men and a Cradle. ==Other websites== * Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:Algerian actors Category:French comedians Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors
title: Marthe Villalonga
